message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'd really enjoy. I'm asking for $120 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $110. That's still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I'm still not sure I'm willing to go that high. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $105. Is that something you'd be willing to do?
